This app uses your camera to identify handwritten numbers using an AI model trained by us.

 To get started, please allow access to your camera.
InkSight is an experimental application that uses an on-device TensorFlow Lite model to recognize handwritten digits.
Point your camera at a handwritten digit (0â€“9). The app will process the central area of your screen in real time.
The captured frame is cropped, converted to grayscale, and resized to 28x28 pixels to match the MNIST dataset format used during training.
The model was trained locally using TensorFlow 2.0 to ensure fast and private inference on your device.
For best results, ensure good lighting and draw digits clearly on a plain background.
You can always re-enable this tutorial in the settings.
